00002 //=================================================================================================
00003 //    MouseSystem.c
00004 //
00005 //    Routines for handling prioritized mouse regions. The system as setup below allows the use of
00006 //    callback functions for each region, as well as allowing a different cursor to be defined for
00007 //    each region.
00008 //
00009 //    Written by Bret Rowdon, Jan 30 '97
00010 //  Re-Written by Kris Morness, since...
00011 //
00012 //=================================================================================================

00111 //Kris:

00113 //when an error appears here, that you need to go below to the init code and initialize the
00114 //values there as well.  That's the only reason why I left this here.
00115 MOUSE_REGION MSYS_SystemBaseRegion = {
00116                                                 MSYS_ID_SYSTEM, MSYS_PRIORITY_SYSTEM, BASE_REGION_FLAGS,
00117                                                 -32767, -32767, 32767, 32767, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
00118                                                 MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, { 0,0,0,0 },
00119                                                 0, 0, -1, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, NULL, NULL };

00121 BOOLEAN                             gfRefreshUpdate = FALSE;

00125 //an already deleted region.  It will also ensure that you don't create an identical region
00126 //that already exists.

00140 //======================================================================================================
00141 //    MSYS_Init
00142 //
00143 //    Initialize the mouse system.
00144 //
00145 INT32 MSYS_Init(void)
00146 {
00147       RegisterDebugTopic(TOPIC_MOUSE_SYSTEM, "Mouse Region System");
00148 
00149       #ifdef MOUSESYSTEM_DEBUGGING
00150             gfIgnoreShutdownAssertions = FALSE;
00151       #endif
00152       if(MSYS_RegList!=NULL)
00153             MSYS_TrashRegList();
00154 
00155       MSYS_CurrentID = MSYS_ID_SYSTEM;
00156       MSYS_ScanForID = FALSE;
00157 
00158       MSYS_CurrentMX = 0;
00159       MSYS_CurrentMY = 0;
00160       MSYS_CurrentButtons = 0;
00161       MSYS_Action=MSYS_NO_ACTION;
00162 
00163       MSYS_PrevRegion = NULL;
00164       MSYS_SystemInitialized = TRUE;
00165       MSYS_UseMouseHandlerHook = FALSE;
00166 
00167       MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed=FALSE;
00168       MSYS_GrabRegion = NULL;
00169 
00170       // Setup the system's background region
00171       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.IDNumber                                    = MSYS_ID_SYSTEM;
00172       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.PriorityLevel                   = MSYS_PRIORITY_SYSTEM;
00173       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.uiFlags                                           = BASE_REGION_FLAGS;
00174       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.RegionTopLeftX                  = -32767;
00175       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.RegionTopLeftY                  = -32767;
00176       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.RegionBottomRightX  = 32767;
00177       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.RegionBottomRightY  = 32767;
00178       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.MouseXPos                                   = 0;
00179       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.MouseYPos                                   = 0;
00180       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.RelativeXPos                    = 0;
00181       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.RelativeYPos                    = 0;
00182       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.ButtonState                           = 0;
00183       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.Cursor                                      = 0;
00184       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.UserData[0]                           = 0;
00185       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.UserData[1]                           = 0;
00186       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.UserData[2]                           = 0;
00187       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.UserData[3]                           = 0;
00188       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.MovementCallback          = MSYS_NO_CALLBACK;
00189       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.ButtonCallback                  = MSYS_NO_CALLBACK;
00190 
00191       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.FastHelpTimer                   = 0;
00192       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.FastHelpText                    = 0;
00193       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.FastHelpRect                    = -1;
00194 
00195       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.next                                              = NULL;
00196       MSYS_SystemBaseRegion.prev                                              = NULL;
00197 
00198       // Add the base region to the list
00199       MSYS_AddRegionToList(&MSYS_SystemBaseRegion);
00200 
00201 #ifdef _MOUSE_SYSTEM_HOOK_
00202       MSYS_UseMouseHandlerHook = TRUE;
00203 #endif
00204 
00205       return(1);
00206 }

00210 //======================================================================================================
00211 //    MSYS_Shutdown
00212 //
00213 //    De-inits the "mousesystem" mouse region handling code.
00214 //
00215 void MSYS_Shutdown(void)
00216 {
00217       #ifdef MOUSESYSTEM_DEBUGGING
00218             gfIgnoreShutdownAssertions = TRUE;
00219       #endif
00220       MSYS_SystemInitialized = FALSE;
00221       MSYS_UseMouseHandlerHook = FALSE;
00222       MSYS_TrashRegList();
00223       UnRegisterDebugTopic(TOPIC_MOUSE_SYSTEM, "Mouse Region System");
00224 }

00228 //======================================================================================================
00229 //    MSYS_SGP_Mouse_Handler_Hook
00230 //
00231 //    Hook to the SGP's mouse handler
00232 //
00233 void MSYS_SGP_Mouse_Handler_Hook(UINT16 Type,UINT16 Xcoord, UINT16 Ycoord, BOOLEAN LeftButton, BOOLEAN RightButton)
00234 {
00235       // If the mouse system isn't initialized, get out o' here
00236       if(!MSYS_SystemInitialized)
00237                   return;
00238 
00239       // If we're not using the handler stuff, ignore this call
00240       if(!MSYS_UseMouseHandlerHook)
00241                   return;
00242 
00243       MSYS_Action=MSYS_NO_ACTION;
00244       switch(Type)
00245       {
00246             case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00247             case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00248             case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00249             case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP:
00250                   //MSYS_Action|=MSYS_DO_BUTTONS;
00251                   if(Type == LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN)
00252                         MSYS_Action |= MSYS_DO_LBUTTON_DWN;
00253                   else if(Type == LEFT_BUTTON_UP)
00254                   {
00255                         MSYS_Action |= MSYS_DO_LBUTTON_UP;
00256                         //Kris:
00257                         //Used only if applicable.  This is used for that special button that is locked with the
00258                         //mouse press -- just like windows.  When you release the button, the previous state
00259                         //of the button is restored if you released the mouse outside of it's boundaries.  If
00260                         //you release inside of the button, the action is selected -- but later in the code.
00261                         //NOTE:  It has to be here, because the mouse can be released anywhere regardless of
00262                         //regions, buttons, etc.
00263                         #ifdef JA2
00264                               ReleaseAnchorMode();
00265                         #endif
00266                   }
00267                   else if(Type == RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN)
00268                         MSYS_Action |= MSYS_DO_RBUTTON_DWN;
00269                   else if(Type == RIGHT_BUTTON_UP)
00270                         MSYS_Action |= MSYS_DO_RBUTTON_UP;
00271 
00272                   if(LeftButton)
00273                         MSYS_CurrentButtons|=MSYS_LEFT_BUTTON;
00274                   else
00275                         MSYS_CurrentButtons&=(~MSYS_LEFT_BUTTON);
00276 
00277                   if(RightButton)
00278                         MSYS_CurrentButtons|=MSYS_RIGHT_BUTTON;
00279                   else
00280                         MSYS_CurrentButtons&=(~MSYS_RIGHT_BUTTON);
00281 
00282                   if((Xcoord != MSYS_CurrentMX) || (Ycoord != MSYS_CurrentMY))
00283                   {
00284                         MSYS_Action|=MSYS_DO_MOVE;
00285                         MSYS_CurrentMX = Xcoord;
00286                         MSYS_CurrentMY = Ycoord;
00287                   }
00288 
00289                   MSYS_UpdateMouseRegion();
00290                   break;
00291 
00292             // ATE: Checks here for mouse button repeats.....
00293             // Call mouse region with new reason
00294             case LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT:
00295             case RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT:
00296 
00297                   if(Type == LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT)
00298                         MSYS_Action |= MSYS_DO_LBUTTON_REPEAT;
00299                   else if(Type == RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT)
00300                         MSYS_Action |= MSYS_DO_RBUTTON_REPEAT;
00301 
00302                   if((Xcoord != MSYS_CurrentMX) || (Ycoord != MSYS_CurrentMY))
00303                   {
00304                         MSYS_Action|=MSYS_DO_MOVE;
00305                         MSYS_CurrentMX = Xcoord;
00306                         MSYS_CurrentMY = Ycoord;
00307                   }
00308 
00309                   MSYS_UpdateMouseRegion();
00310                   break;
00311 
00312             case MOUSE_POS:
00313                   if((Xcoord != MSYS_CurrentMX) || (Ycoord != MSYS_CurrentMY) || gfRefreshUpdate )
00314                   {
00315                         MSYS_Action|=MSYS_DO_MOVE;
00316                         MSYS_CurrentMX = Xcoord;
00317                         MSYS_CurrentMY = Ycoord;
00318 
00319                         gfRefreshUpdate = FALSE;
00320 
00321                         MSYS_UpdateMouseRegion();
00322                   }
00323                   break;
00324 
00325             default:
00326               DbgMessage(TOPIC_MOUSE_SYSTEM, DBG_LEVEL_0, "ERROR -- MSYS 2 SGP Mouse Hook got bad type");
00327                   break;
00328       }
00329 }

00333 //======================================================================================================
00334 //    MSYS_GetNewID
00335 //
00336 //    Returns a unique ID number for region nodes. If no new ID numbers can be found, the MAX value
00337 //    is returned.
00338 //
00339 INT32 MSYS_GetNewID(void)
00340 {
00341       INT32 retID;
00342       INT32 Current,found,done;
00343       MOUSE_REGION *node;
00344 
00345       retID = MSYS_CurrentID;
00346       MSYS_CurrentID++;
00347 
00348       // Crapy scan for an unused ID
00349       if((MSYS_CurrentID >= MSYS_ID_MAX) || MSYS_ScanForID)
00350       {
00351             MSYS_ScanForID = TRUE;
00352             Current = MSYS_ID_BASE;
00353             done=found=FALSE;
00354             while(!done)
00355             {
00356                   found=FALSE;
00357                   node=MSYS_RegList;
00358                   while(node!=NULL && !found)
00359                   {
00360                         if(node->IDNumber == Current)
00361                               found=TRUE;
00362                   }
00363 
00364                   if(found && Current < MSYS_ID_MAX)  // Current ID is in use, and their are more to scan
00365                         Current++;
00366                   else
00367                   {
00368                         done=TRUE;                                // Got an ID to use.
00369                         if(found)
00370                               Current=MSYS_ID_MAX;          // Ooops, ran out of IDs, use MAX value!
00371                   }
00372             }
00373             MSYS_CurrentID = Current;
00374       }
00375 
00376       return(retID);
00377 }

00381 //======================================================================================================
00382 //    MSYS_TrashRegList
00383 //
00384 //    Deletes the entire region list.
00385 //
00386 void MSYS_TrashRegList(void)
00387 {
00388       while( MSYS_RegList )
00389       {
00390             if( MSYS_RegList->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
00391             {
00392                   MSYS_RemoveRegion(MSYS_RegList);
00393             }
00394             else
00395             {
00396                   MSYS_RegList = MSYS_RegList->next;
00397             }
00398       } 
00399 }
00400

00402 
00403 //======================================================================================================
00404 //    MSYS_AddRegionToList
00405 //
00406 //    Add a region struct to the current list. The list is sorted by priority levels. If two entries
00407 //    have the same priority level, then the latest to enter the list gets the higher priority.
00408 //
00409 void MSYS_AddRegionToList(MOUSE_REGION *region)
00410 {
00411       MOUSE_REGION *curr;
00412       INT32 done;
00413 
00414 
00415       // If region seems to already be in list, delete it so we can
00416       // re-insert the region.
00417       if( region->next || region->prev )
00418       { // if it wasn't actually there, then call does nothing!
00419             MSYS_DeleteRegionFromList(region);
00420       }
00421 
00422       // Set an ID number!
00423       region->IDNumber = (UINT16)MSYS_GetNewID();
00424 
00425       region->next = NULL;
00426       region->prev = NULL;
00427 
00428       if( !MSYS_RegList )
00429       { // Null list, so add it straight up.
00430             MSYS_RegList = region;
00431       }
00432       else
00433       {
00434             // Walk down list until we find place to insert (or at end of list)
00435             curr=MSYS_RegList;
00436             done=FALSE;
00437             while((curr->next != NULL) && !done)
00438             {
00439                   if(curr->PriorityLevel <= region->PriorityLevel)
00440                         done=TRUE;
00441                   else
00442                         curr = curr->next;
00443             }
00444 
00445             if(curr->PriorityLevel > region->PriorityLevel)
00446             {
00447                   // Add after curr node
00448                   region->next = curr->next;
00449                   curr->next = region;
00450                   region->prev = curr;
00451                   if(region->next != NULL)
00452                         region->next->prev = region;
00453             }
00454             else
00455             {
00456                   // Add before curr node
00457                   region->next = curr;
00458                   region->prev = curr->prev;
00459 
00460                   curr->prev = region;
00461                   if(region->prev != NULL)
00462                         region->prev->next = region;
00463 
00464                   if(MSYS_RegList==curr)  // Make sure if adding at start, to adjust the list pointer
00465                         MSYS_RegList=region;
00466             }
00467       }
00468 }
00469

00472 //======================================================================================================
00473 //    MSYS_RegionInList
00474 //
00475 //    Scan region list for presence of a node with the same region ID number
00476 //
00477 INT32 MSYS_RegionInList( MOUSE_REGION *region )
00478 {
00479       MOUSE_REGION *Current;
00480       INT32 found;
00481 
00482       found = FALSE;
00483       Current = MSYS_RegList;
00484       while( Current && !found )
00485       {
00486             if(Current->IDNumber == region->IDNumber)
00487                   found=TRUE;
00488             Current = Current->next;
00489       }
00490       return(found);
00491 }
00492 
00493 
00494 
00495 //======================================================================================================
00496 //    MSYS_DeleteRegionFromList
00497 //
00498 //    Removes a region from the current list.
00499 //
00500 void MSYS_DeleteRegionFromList(MOUSE_REGION *region)
00501 {
00502       // If no list present, there's nothin' to do.
00503       if( !MSYS_RegList )
00504             return;
00505 
00506       // Check if region in list
00507       if(!MSYS_RegionInList(region))
00508             return;
00509 
00510       // Remove a node from the list
00511       if(MSYS_RegList == region)
00512       { // First node on list, adjust main pointer.
00513             MSYS_RegList = region->next;
00514             if(MSYS_RegList!=NULL)
00515                   MSYS_RegList->prev = NULL;
00516             region->next = region->prev = NULL;
00517       }
00518       else
00519       {
00520             if(region->prev)
00521                   region->prev->next = region->next;
00522             // If not last node in list, adjust following node's ->prev entry.
00523             if( region->next )
00524                   region->next->prev = region->prev;
00525             region->prev = region->next = NULL;
00526       }
00527 
00528       // Did we delete a grabbed region?
00529       if(MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed)
00530       {
00531             if(MSYS_GrabRegion == region)
00532             {
00533                   MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed = FALSE;
00534                   MSYS_GrabRegion = NULL;
00535             }
00536       }
00537 
00538       // Is only the system background region remaining?
00539       if(MSYS_RegList == &MSYS_SystemBaseRegion)
00540       {
00541             // Yup, so let's reset the ID values!
00542             MSYS_CurrentID = MSYS_ID_BASE;
00543             MSYS_ScanForID = FALSE;
00544       }
00545       else if(MSYS_RegList == NULL)
00546       {
00547             // Ack, we actually emptied the list, so let's reset for re-init possibilities
00548             MSYS_CurrentID = MSYS_ID_SYSTEM;
00549             MSYS_ScanForID = FALSE;
00550       }
00551 }
00552 
00553 
00554 
00555 //======================================================================================================
00556 //    MSYS_UpdateMouseRegion
00557 //
00558 //    Searches the list for the highest priority region and updates it's info. It also dispatches
00559 //    the callback functions
00560 //
00561 void MSYS_UpdateMouseRegion(void)
00562 {
00563       INT32 found;
00564       UINT32 ButtonReason;
00565   MOUSE_REGION *pTempRegion;
00566       BOOLEAN fFound=FALSE;
00567       found=FALSE;
00568 
00569       // Check previous region!
00570       if(MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed)
00571       {
00572             MSYS_CurrRegion = MSYS_GrabRegion;
00573             found = TRUE;
00574       }
00575       if(!found)
00576             MSYS_CurrRegion = MSYS_RegList;
00577 
00578       while( !found && MSYS_CurrRegion )
00579       {
00580             if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & (MSYS_REGION_ENABLED | MSYS_ALLOW_DISABLED_FASTHELP) &&
00581                (MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionTopLeftX <= MSYS_CurrentMX) &&         // Check boundaries
00582                (MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionTopLeftY <= MSYS_CurrentMY) &&
00583                (MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionBottomRightX >= MSYS_CurrentMX) &&
00584                (MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionBottomRightY >= MSYS_CurrentMY))
00585             {
00586                   // We got the right region. We don't need to check for priorities 'cause
00587                   // the whole list is sorted the right way!
00588                   found=TRUE;
00589             }
00590             else
00591                   MSYS_CurrRegion = MSYS_CurrRegion->next;
00592       }
00593 
00594       if( MSYS_PrevRegion )
00595       {
00596             MSYS_PrevRegion->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA);
00597 
00598             if ( MSYS_PrevRegion != MSYS_CurrRegion )
00599             {
00600                   //Remove the help text for the previous region if one is currently being displayed.
00601                   if( MSYS_PrevRegion->FastHelpText )
00602                   {
00603                         //ExecuteMouseHelpEndCallBack( MSYS_PrevRegion );
00604 
00605                         #ifdef _JA2_RENDER_DIRTY
00606                               if( MSYS_PrevRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND )
00607                                     FreeBackgroundRectPending( MSYS_PrevRegion->FastHelpRect );
00608                         #endif
00609                         MSYS_PrevRegion->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND);
00610                         MSYS_PrevRegion->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_FASTHELP_RESET);
00611 
00612                         #ifndef UTIL 
00613                               // dirty buttons, need a re-render
00614 //DEF: Nov 30 98
00615 //                      PausedMarkButtonsDirty( );
00616                         #endif
00617 
00618                         //if( region->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED )
00619                         //    region->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00620 #ifndef JA2             
00621                                           VideoRemoveToolTip();
00622 #endif
00623                   }
00624 
00625                   MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer = gsFastHelpDelay;
00626 
00627                   // Force a callbacks to happen on previous region to indicate that
00628                   // the mouse has left the old region
00629                   if ( MSYS_PrevRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOVE_CALLBACK && MSYS_PrevRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED )
00630                         (*(MSYS_PrevRegion->MovementCallback))(MSYS_PrevRegion,MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE);
00631             }
00632       }
00633 
00634       // If a region was found in the list, update it's data
00635       if(found)
00636       {
00637             if(MSYS_CurrRegion != MSYS_PrevRegion)
00638             {
00639                   //Kris -- October 27, 1997
00640                   //Implemented gain mouse region
00641                   if ( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOVE_CALLBACK )
00642                   {
00643                         if( MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpText && !( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_FASTHELP_RESET ) )
00644                         {
00645                           //ExecuteMouseHelpEndCallBack( MSYS_CurrRegion );
00646                               MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer = gsFastHelpDelay;
00647                               #ifdef _JA2_RENDER_DIRTY
00648                                     if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND )
00649                                           FreeBackgroundRectPending( MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpRect );
00650                               #endif
00651                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND);
00652                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags |= MSYS_FASTHELP_RESET;
00653 
00654 #ifndef JA2             
00655                                           VideoRemoveToolTip();
00656 #endif
00657 
00658                               //if( b->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
00659                               //    b->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00660                         }
00661                         if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED )
00662                         {
00663                               (*(MSYS_CurrRegion->MovementCallback))(MSYS_CurrRegion,MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE);
00664                         }
00665                   }
00666 
00667                   // if the cursor is set and is not set to no cursor
00668       if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED && 
00669                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_SET_CURSOR && 
00670                               MSYS_CurrRegion->Cursor != MSYS_NO_CURSOR )
00671                   {
00672                         MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(MSYS_CurrRegion->Cursor);
00673                   }
00674                   else
00675                   {
00676            // Addition Oct 10/1997 Carter, patch for mouse cursor
00677                    // start at region and find another region encompassing
00678                    pTempRegion=MSYS_CurrRegion->next;
00679                    while((pTempRegion!=NULL)&&(!fFound))
00680                    {
00681         if((pTempRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED) &&
00682                    (pTempRegion->RegionTopLeftX <= MSYS_CurrentMX) &&
00683                    (pTempRegion->RegionTopLeftY <= MSYS_CurrentMY) &&
00684                    (pTempRegion->RegionBottomRightX >= MSYS_CurrentMX) &&
00685                    (pTempRegion->RegionBottomRightY >= MSYS_CurrentMY)&&(pTempRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_SET_CURSOR))
00686                         {
00687                fFound=TRUE;
00688                          if( pTempRegion->Cursor != MSYS_NO_CURSOR )
00689                          {
00690                                MSYS_SetCurrentCursor(pTempRegion->Cursor);
00691                          }
00692                         }
00693         pTempRegion=pTempRegion->next;
00694                    }
00695       }
00696             }
00697 
00698             // OK, if we do not have a button down, any button is game!
00699             if ( !gfClickedModeOn || ( gfClickedModeOn && gusClickedIDNumber == MSYS_CurrRegion->IDNumber ) )
00700             {
00701                   MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags |= MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA;
00702 
00703                   MSYS_CurrRegion->MouseXPos = MSYS_CurrentMX;
00704                   MSYS_CurrRegion->MouseYPos = MSYS_CurrentMY;
00705                   MSYS_CurrRegion->RelativeXPos = MSYS_CurrentMX - MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionTopLeftX;
00706                   MSYS_CurrRegion->RelativeYPos = MSYS_CurrentMY - MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionTopLeftY;
00707 
00708                   MSYS_CurrRegion->ButtonState = MSYS_CurrentButtons;
00709 
00710                   if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED &&
00711                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOVE_CALLBACK && MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_MOVE )
00712                   {
00713                         (*(MSYS_CurrRegion->MovementCallback))(MSYS_CurrRegion,MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE);
00714                   }
00715 
00716                   //ExecuteMouseHelpEndCallBack( MSYS_CurrRegion );
00717                   //MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer = gsFastHelpDelay;
00718 
00719                   MSYS_Action &= (~MSYS_DO_MOVE);
00720 
00721                   if((MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_BUTTON_CALLBACK) && (MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_BUTTONS))
00722                   {
00723                         if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED )
00724                         {
00725                               ButtonReason=MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_NONE;
00726                               if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_LBUTTON_DWN)
00727                               {
00728                                     ButtonReason|=MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN;
00729                                     gfClickedModeOn = TRUE;
00730                                     // Set global ID
00731                                     gusClickedIDNumber = MSYS_CurrRegion->IDNumber;
00732                               }
00733 
00734                               if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_LBUTTON_UP )
00735                               {
00736                                     ButtonReason|=MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP;
00737                                     gfClickedModeOn = FALSE;
00738                               }
00739 
00740                               if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_RBUTTON_DWN)
00741                               {
00742                                     ButtonReason|=MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN;
00743                                     gfClickedModeOn = TRUE;
00744                                     // Set global ID
00745                                     gusClickedIDNumber = MSYS_CurrRegion->IDNumber;
00746                               }
00747 
00748                               if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_RBUTTON_UP  )
00749                               {
00750                                     ButtonReason|=MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP;
00751                                     gfClickedModeOn = FALSE;
00752                               }
00753 
00754                               // ATE: Added repeat resons....
00755                               if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_LBUTTON_REPEAT  )
00756                               {
00757                                     ButtonReason|=MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT;
00758                               }
00759 
00760                               if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_RBUTTON_REPEAT  )
00761                               {
00762                                     ButtonReason|=MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_REPEAT;
00763                               }
00764 
00765                               if( ButtonReason != MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_NONE )
00766                               {
00767                                     if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_FASTHELP )
00768                                     {
00769                                           // Button was clicked so remove any FastHelp text
00770                                           MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_FASTHELP);
00771                                           #ifdef _JA2_RENDER_DIRTY
00772                                                 if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND )
00773                                                       FreeBackgroundRectPending( MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpRect );
00774                                           #endif
00775                                           MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND);
00776 
00777                                           //ExecuteMouseHelpEndCallBack( MSYS_CurrRegion );
00778                                           MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer = gsFastHelpDelay;
00779                                           MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_FASTHELP_RESET);
00780 
00781                                           //if( b->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
00782                                           //    b->uiFlags |= BUTTON_DIRTY;
00783 #ifndef JA2
00784                                           VideoRemoveToolTip();
00785 #endif
00786                                     }
00787 
00788                                     //Kris: Nov 31, 1999 -- Added support for double click events.
00789                                     //This is where double clicks are checked and passed down.
00790                                     if( ButtonReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00791                                     {
00792                                           UINT32 uiCurrTime = GetClock();
00793                                           if( gpRegionLastLButtonDown == MSYS_CurrRegion &&
00794                                                       gpRegionLastLButtonUp == MSYS_CurrRegion &&
00795                                                       uiCurrTime <= guiRegionLastLButtonDownTime + MSYS_DOUBLECLICK_DELAY )
00796                                           { //Sequential left click on same button within the maximum time allowed for a double click
00797                                                 //Double click check succeeded, set flag and reset double click globals.
00798                                                 ButtonReason |= MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DOUBLECLICK;
00799                                                 gpRegionLastLButtonDown = NULL;
00800                                                 gpRegionLastLButtonUp = NULL;
00801                                                 guiRegionLastLButtonDownTime = 0;
00802                                           }
00803                                           else 
00804                                           { //First click, record time and region pointer (to check if 2nd click detected later)
00805                                                 gpRegionLastLButtonDown = MSYS_CurrRegion;
00806                                                 guiRegionLastLButtonDownTime = GetClock();
00807                                           }
00808                                     }
00809                                     else if( ButtonReason == MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00810                                     {
00811                                           UINT32 uiCurrTime = GetClock();
00812                                           if( gpRegionLastLButtonDown == MSYS_CurrRegion &&
00813                                                       uiCurrTime <= guiRegionLastLButtonDownTime + MSYS_DOUBLECLICK_DELAY )
00814                                           { //Double click is Left down, then left up, then left down.  We have just detected the left up here (step 2).
00815                                                 gpRegionLastLButtonUp = MSYS_CurrRegion;
00816                                           }
00817                                           else 
00818                                           { //User released mouse outside of current button, so kill any chance of a double click happening.
00819                                                 gpRegionLastLButtonDown = NULL;
00820                                                 gpRegionLastLButtonUp = NULL;
00821                                                 guiRegionLastLButtonDownTime = 0;
00822                                           }
00823                                     }
00824 
00825                                     (*(MSYS_CurrRegion->ButtonCallback))(MSYS_CurrRegion,ButtonReason);
00826                               }
00827                         }
00828                   }
00829 
00830                   MSYS_Action &= (~MSYS_DO_BUTTONS);
00831             }
00832             else if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_ENABLED )
00833             {
00834                   // OK here, if we have release a button, UNSET LOCK wherever you are....
00835                   // Just don't give this button the message....
00836                   if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_RBUTTON_UP  )
00837                   {
00838                         gfClickedModeOn = FALSE;
00839                   }
00840                   if(MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_LBUTTON_UP  )
00841                   {
00842                         gfClickedModeOn = FALSE;
00843                   }
00844 
00845                   // OK, you still want move messages however....
00846                   MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags |= MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA;
00847                   MSYS_CurrRegion->MouseXPos = MSYS_CurrentMX;
00848                   MSYS_CurrRegion->MouseYPos = MSYS_CurrentMY;
00849                   MSYS_CurrRegion->RelativeXPos = MSYS_CurrentMX - MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionTopLeftX;
00850                   MSYS_CurrRegion->RelativeYPos = MSYS_CurrentMY - MSYS_CurrRegion->RegionTopLeftY;
00851 
00852                   if((MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOVE_CALLBACK) && (MSYS_Action & MSYS_DO_MOVE))
00853                   {
00854                         (*(MSYS_CurrRegion->MovementCallback))(MSYS_CurrRegion,MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE);
00855                   }
00856 
00857                   MSYS_Action &= (~MSYS_DO_MOVE);
00858             }
00859             MSYS_PrevRegion = MSYS_CurrRegion;
00860       }
00861       else
00862             MSYS_PrevRegion = NULL;
00863 }
00864 
00865 
00866 
00867 //=================================================================================================
00868 //    MSYS_DefineRegion
00869 //
00870 //    Inits a MOUSE_REGION structure for use with the mouse system
00871 //
00872 void MSYS_DefineRegion(MOUSE_REGION *region,UINT16 tlx,UINT16 tly,UINT16 brx,UINT16 bry,INT8 priority,
00873                                  UINT16 crsr,MOUSE_CALLBACK movecallback,MOUSE_CALLBACK buttoncallback)
00874 {
00875       #ifdef MOUSESYSTEM_DEBUGGING
00876             if( region->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS )
00877                   AssertMsg( 0, "Attempting to define a region that already exists." );
00878       #endif
00879 
00880       region->IDNumber = MSYS_ID_BASE;
00881 
00882       if(priority == MSYS_PRIORITY_AUTO)
00883             priority = MSYS_PRIORITY_BASE;
00884       else if(priority <= MSYS_PRIORITY_LOWEST)
00885             priority = MSYS_PRIORITY_LOWEST;
00886       else if(priority >= MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST)
00887             priority = MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST;
00888 
00889       region->PriorityLevel = priority;
00890 
00891       region->uiFlags = MSYS_NO_FLAGS;
00892 
00893       region->MovementCallback = movecallback;
00894       if(movecallback != MSYS_NO_CALLBACK)
00895             region->uiFlags |= MSYS_MOVE_CALLBACK;
00896 
00897       region->ButtonCallback = buttoncallback;
00898       if(buttoncallback != MSYS_NO_CALLBACK)
00899             region->uiFlags |= MSYS_BUTTON_CALLBACK;
00900 
00901       region->Cursor = crsr;
00902       if(crsr != MSYS_NO_CURSOR)
00903             region->uiFlags |= MSYS_SET_CURSOR;
00904 
00905       region->RegionTopLeftX = tlx;
00906       region->RegionTopLeftY = tly;
00907       region->RegionBottomRightX = brx;
00908       region->RegionBottomRightY = bry;
00909 
00910       region->MouseXPos = 0;
00911       region->MouseYPos = 0;
00912       region->RelativeXPos = 0;
00913       region->RelativeYPos = 0;
00914       region->ButtonState     = 0;
00915 
00916       //Init fasthelp
00917       region->FastHelpText = NULL;
00918       region->FastHelpTimer = 0;
00919 
00920       region->next = NULL;
00921       region->prev = NULL;
00922       region->HelpDoneCallback = NULL;
00923 
00924       //Add region to system list
00925       MSYS_AddRegionToList(region);
00926       region->uiFlags|= MSYS_REGION_ENABLED | MSYS_REGION_EXISTS;
00927 
00928 
00929       // Dirty our update flag
00930       gfRefreshUpdate = TRUE;
00931 }
00932 
00933 
00934 
00935 //=================================================================================================
00936 //    MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor
00937 //
00938 void MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor(MOUSE_REGION *region,UINT16 crsr)
00939 {
00940       region->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_SET_CURSOR);
00941       region->Cursor = crsr;
00942       if(crsr != MSYS_NO_CURSOR)
00943       {
00944             region->uiFlags |= MSYS_SET_CURSOR;
00945 
00946             // If we are not in the region, donot update!
00947             if ( !( region->uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA ) )
00948             {
00949                   return;
00950             }
00951 
00952             // Update cursor
00953             MSYS_SetCurrentCursor( crsr );
00954       }
00955 }

00959 //=================================================================================================
00960 //    MSYS_AddRegion
00961 //
00962 //    Adds a defined mouse region to the system list. Once inserted, it enables the region then
00963 //    calls the callback functions, if any, for initialization.
00964 //
00965 INT32 MSYS_AddRegion(MOUSE_REGION *region)
00966 {
00967       return(1);
00968 }
00969 
00970 
00971 
00972 //=================================================================================================
00973 //    MSYS_RemoveRegion
00974 //
00975 //    Removes a region from the list, disables it, then calls the callback functions for
00976 //    de-initialization.
00977 //
00978 void MSYS_RemoveRegion(MOUSE_REGION *region)
00979 {
00980       if( !region )
00981       {
00982             #ifdef MOUSESYSTEM_DEBUGGING
00983             if( gfIgnoreShutdownAssertions )
00984             #endif
00985                   return;
00986             AssertMsg( 0, "Attempting to remove a NULL region.");
00987       }
00988       #ifdef MOUSESYSTEM_DEBUGGING
00989       if( !(region->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS) )
00990             AssertMsg( 0, "Attempting to remove an already removed region." );
00991       #endif
00992 
00993 #ifdef _JA2_RENDER_DIRTY
00994       if( region->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00995       {
00996             FreeBackgroundRectPending( region->FastHelpRect );
00997             region->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT);
00998 
00999 
01000       }
01001 #endif
01002 
01003       // Get rid of the FastHelp text (if applicable)
01004       if( region->FastHelpText )
01005       {
01006 #ifndef JA2
01007             if(region->uiFlags & MSYS_FASTHELP)
01008                   VideoRemoveToolTip();
01009 #endif
01010             MemFree( region->FastHelpText );
01011       }
01012       region->FastHelpText = NULL;
01013 
01014       MSYS_DeleteRegionFromList(region);
01015 
01016       //if the previous region is the one that we are deleting, reset the previous region
01017       if ( MSYS_PrevRegion == region )
01018             MSYS_PrevRegion = NULL;
01019       //if the current region is the one that we are deleting, then clear it.
01020       if( MSYS_CurrRegion == region )
01021             MSYS_CurrRegion = NULL;
01022 
01023       //dirty our update flag
01024       gfRefreshUpdate = TRUE;
01025 
01026       // Check if this is a locked region, and unlock if so
01027       if ( gfClickedModeOn )
01028       {
01029             // Set global ID
01030             if ( gusClickedIDNumber == region->IDNumber )
01031             {
01032                   gfClickedModeOn = FALSE;
01033             }
01034       }
01035 
01036       //clear all internal values (including the region exists flag)
01037       memset( region, 0, sizeof( MOUSE_REGION ) );
01038 }
01039

01092 //=================================================================================================
01093 //    MSYS_SetRegionUserData
01094 //
01095 //    Sets one of the four user data entries in a mouse region
01096 //
01097 void MSYS_SetRegionUserData(MOUSE_REGION *region,INT32 index,INT32 userdata)
01098 {
01099       if(index < 0 || index > 3)
01100       {
01101             UINT8 str[80];
01102             #ifdef MOUSESYSTEM_DEBUGGING
01103             if( gfIgnoreShutdownAssertions )
01104             #endif
01105                   return;
01106             sprintf( (char *)str, "Attempting MSYS_SetRegionUserData() with out of range index %d.", index );
01107             AssertMsg( 0, str );
01108       }
01109       region->UserData[index]=userdata;
01110 }
01111 
01112 
01113 
01114 //=================================================================================================
01115 //    MSYS_GetRegionUserData
01116 //
01117 //    Retrieves one of the four user data entries in a mouse region
01118 //
01119 INT32 MSYS_GetRegionUserData(MOUSE_REGION *region,INT32 index)
01120 {
01121       if(index < 0 || index > 3)
01122       {
01123             UINT8 str[80];
01124             #ifdef MOUSESYSTEM_DEBUGGING
01125             if( gfIgnoreShutdownAssertions )
01126             #endif
01127                   return 0;
01128             sprintf( (char *)str, "Attempting MSYS_GetRegionUserData() with out of range index %d", index );
01129             AssertMsg( 0, str );
01130       }
01131       return(region->UserData[index]);
01132 }

01134 
01135 
01136 //=================================================================================================
01137 //    MSYS_GrabMouse
01138 //
01139 //    Assigns all mouse activity to a region, effectively blocking any other region from having
01140 //    control.
01141 //
01142 INT32 MSYS_GrabMouse(MOUSE_REGION *region)
01143 {
01144       if(!MSYS_RegionInList(region))
01145             return(MSYS_REGION_NOT_IN_LIST);
01146 
01147       if(MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed == TRUE)
01148             return(MSYS_ALREADY_GRABBED);
01149 
01150       MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed = TRUE;
01151       MSYS_GrabRegion = region;
01152       return(MSYS_GRABBED_OK);
01153 }
01154 
01155 
01156 
01157 //=================================================================================================
01158 //    MSYS_ReleaseMouse
01159 //
01160 //    Releases a previously grabbed mouse region
01161 //
01162 void MSYS_ReleaseMouse(MOUSE_REGION *region)
01163 {
01164       if(MSYS_GrabRegion != region)
01165             return;
01166 
01167       if(MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed == TRUE)
01168       {
01169             MSYS_Mouse_Grabbed = FALSE;
01170             MSYS_GrabRegion = NULL;
01171             MSYS_UpdateMouseRegion();
01172       }
01173 }
01174 
01175 
01176 /* ==================================================================================
01177    MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( MOUSE_REGION *region, INT16 sX, INT16 sY)
01178 
01179        Moves a Mouse region to X Y on the screen
01180 
01181 */
01182 
01183 void MSYS_MoveMouseRegionTo( MOUSE_REGION *region, INT16 sX, INT16 sY)
01184 {
01185 
01186   INT16 sWidth;
01187       INT16 sHeight;
01188 
01189 
01190       sWidth =  region ->RegionBottomRightX - region ->RegionTopLeftX;
01191       sHeight = region ->RegionBottomRightY - region ->RegionTopLeftY;
01192 
01193 
01194       // move top left
01195       region -> RegionTopLeftX = sX;
01196       region -> RegionTopLeftY = sY;
01197 
01198       // now move bottom right based on topleft + width or height
01199   region -> RegionBottomRightX = sX + sWidth;
01200       region -> RegionBottomRightY = sY + sHeight;
01201 
01202       return;
01203 }
01204 
01205 /* ==================================================================================
01206    MSYS_MoveMouseRegionBy( MOUSE_REGION *region, INT16 sDeltaX, INT16 sDeltaY)
01207 
01208        Moves a Mouse region by sDeltaX sDeltaY on the screen
01209 
01210 */
01211 
01212 void MSYS_MoveMouseRegionBy( MOUSE_REGION *region, INT16 sDeltaX, INT16 sDeltaY)
01213 {
01214 
01215       // move top left
01216       region -> RegionTopLeftX = region -> RegionTopLeftX + sDeltaX;
01217       region -> RegionTopLeftY = region -> RegionTopLeftY + sDeltaY;
01218 
01219       // now move bottom right
01220   region -> RegionBottomRightX = region -> RegionBottomRightX + sDeltaX;
01221       region -> RegionBottomRightY = region -> RegionBottomRightY + sDeltaY;
01222 
01223       return;
01224 }
01225 
01226 
01227 // This function will force a re-evaluation of mouse regions
01228 // Usually used to force change of mouse cursor if panels switch, etc
01229 void RefreshMouseRegions( )
01230 {
01231       MSYS_Action|=MSYS_DO_MOVE;
01232 
01233       MSYS_UpdateMouseRegion( );
01234 
01235 }
01236 
01237 template void SetRegionFastHelpText<short *>(MOUSE_REGION *, short *);
01238 template void SetRegionFastHelpText<unsigned short *>(MOUSE_REGION *, unsigned short *);
01239 template void SetRegionFastHelpText<unsigned short const*>(MOUSE_REGION *, unsigned short const*);
01240 template <typename type2>
01241 void SetRegionFastHelpText( MOUSE_REGION *region, type2 szText )
01242 {
01243       Assert( region );
01244 
01245       if( region->FastHelpText )
01246             MemFree( region->FastHelpText );
01247 
01248       region->FastHelpText = NULL;
01249 //    region->FastHelpTimer = 0;
01250       if( !(region->uiFlags & MSYS_REGION_EXISTS) )
01251       {
01252             return;
01253             //AssertMsg( 0, String( "Attempting to set fast help text, \"%S\" to an inactive region.", szText ) );
01254       }
01255 
01256       if( !szText || !wcslen( (wchar_t *)szText ) )
01257             return; //blank (or clear)
01258 
01259       // Allocate memory for the button's FastHelp text string...
01260       region->FastHelpText = (UINT16*)MemAlloc( (wcslen( (wchar_t *)szText ) + 1) * sizeof(UINT16) );
01261       Assert( region->FastHelpText );
01262 
01263       wcscpy( region->FastHelpText, szText );
01264 
01265   // ATE: We could be replacing already existing, active text
01266   // so let's remove the region so it be rebuilt...
01267 
01268       #ifdef JA2
01269       if ( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN )
01270       {
01271       #endif
01272 
01273       #ifdef _JA2_RENDER_DIRTY
01274         if( region->uiFlags & MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND )
01275               FreeBackgroundRectPending( region->FastHelpRect );
01276   #endif
01277 
01278   region->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND);
01279   region->uiFlags &= (~MSYS_FASTHELP_RESET);
01280 
01281       #ifdef JA2
01282       }
01283       #endif
01284 
01285       //region->FastHelpTimer = gsFastHelpDelay;
01286 }
01287 
01288 INT16 GetNumberOfLinesInHeight( STR16 pStringA )
01289 {
01290       STR16 pToken;
01291       INT16 sCounter = 0;
01292       CHAR16 pString[ 512 ];
01293 
01294       wcscpy( pString, pStringA );
01295 
01296       // tokenize
01297       pToken = wcstok( pString, L"\n" );
01298 
01299       while( pToken != NULL )
01300   {
01301              pToken = wcstok( NULL, L"\n" );
01302              sCounter++;
01303       }
01304 
01305       return( sCounter );
01306 }

01310 #ifdef _JA2_RENDER_DIRTY
01311 //=============================================================================
01312 //    DisplayFastHelp
01313 //
01314 //
01315 void DisplayFastHelp( MOUSE_REGION *region )
01316 {
01317       UINT16 usFillColor;
01318       INT32 iX,iY,iW,iH;
01319       INT32 iNumberOfLines = 1;
01320 
01321       if ( region->uiFlags & MSYS_FASTHELP )
01322       {
01323             usFillColor = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(250, 240, 188));
01324 
01325             iW = (INT32)GetWidthOfString( region->FastHelpText ) + 10;
01326             iH = (INT32)( GetNumberOfLinesInHeight( region->FastHelpText ) * (GetFontHeight(FONT10ARIAL)+1) + 8 );
01327 
01328             iX = (INT32)region->RegionTopLeftX + 10;
01329 
01330             if (iX < 0)
01331                   iX = 0;
01332 
01333             if ( (iX + iW) >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
01334                   iX = (SCREEN_WIDTH - iW - 4);
01335 
01336             iY = (INT32)region->RegionTopLeftY - (iH * 3 / 4);
01337             if (iY < 0)
01338                   iY = 0;
01339 
01340             if ( (iY + iH) >= SCREEN_HEIGHT )
01341                   iY = (SCREEN_HEIGHT - iH - 15);
01342 
01343             if ( !(region->uiFlags & MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND) )
01344             {
01345                   region->FastHelpRect = RegisterBackgroundRect(BGND_FLAG_PERMANENT | BGND_FLAG_SAVERECT, NULL, (INT16)iX, (INT16)iY,
01346                                     (INT16)(iX + iW), (INT16)(iY + iH) );
01347                   region->uiFlags |= MSYS_GOT_BACKGROUND;
01348                   region->uiFlags |= MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT;
01349             }
01350             else
01351             {
01352                   UINT8 *pDestBuf;
01353                   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01354                   pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01355                   SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01356                   RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX + 1, iY + 1, iX + iW - 1, iY + iH - 1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 57, 15 ) ), pDestBuf );
01357                   RectangleDraw( TRUE, iX, iY, iX + iW - 2, iY + iH - 2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 227, 198, 88 ) ), pDestBuf );
01358                   UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01359                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
01360                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, iX + 2, iY + 2, iX + iW - 3, iY + iH - 3 );
01361 
01362                   SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01363                   SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01364                   DisplayHelpTokenizedString( region->FastHelpText ,( INT16 )( iX + 5 ), ( INT16 )( iY + 5 ) );
01365                   InvalidateRegion(  iX, iY, (iX + iW) , (iY + iH) );
01366             }
01367       }
01368 }

01370 
01371 INT16 GetWidthOfString( STR16 pStringA )
01372 {
01373       CHAR16 pString[ 512 ];
01374       STR16 pToken;
01375       INT16 sWidth = 0;
01376       wcscpy( pString, pStringA );
01377 
01378       // tokenize
01379       pToken = wcstok( pString, L"\n" );
01380 
01381       while( pToken != NULL )
01382   {
01383             if( sWidth < StringPixLength( pToken, FONT10ARIAL ) )
01384             {
01385                   sWidth = StringPixLength( pToken, FONT10ARIAL );
01386             }
01387 
01388             pToken = wcstok( NULL, L"\n" );
01389       }
01390 
01391       return( sWidth );
01392 
01393 }
01394 
01395 void DisplayHelpTokenizedString( STR16 pStringA, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
01396 {
01397       STR16 pToken;
01398       INT32 iCounter = 0, i;
01399       UINT32 uiCursorXPos;
01400       CHAR16 pString[ 512 ];
01401       INT32 iLength;
01402 
01403       wcscpy( pString, pStringA );
01404 
01405       // tokenize
01406       pToken = wcstok( pString, L"\n" );
01407 
01408       while( pToken != NULL )
01409   {
01410             iLength = (INT32)wcslen( pToken );
01411             for( i = 0; i < iLength; i++ )
01412             {
01413                   uiCursorXPos = StringPixLengthArgFastHelp( FONT10ARIAL, FONT10ARIALBOLD, i, pToken );
01414                   if( pToken[ i ] == '|' )
01415                   {
01416                         i++;
01417                         SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
01418                         SetFontForeground( 146 );
01419                   }
01420                   else
01421                   {
01422                         SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01423                         SetFontForeground( FONT_BEIGE );
01424                   }
01425                   mprintf( sX + uiCursorXPos, sY + iCounter * (GetFontHeight(FONT10ARIAL)+1), L"%c", pToken[ i ] );
01426             }
01427             pToken = wcstok( NULL, L"\n" );
01428             iCounter++;
01429       }
01430       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
01431 }
01432 
01433 void RenderFastHelp()
01434 {
01435       static INT32 iLastClock;
01436       INT32 iTimeDifferential, iCurrentClock;
01437 
01438       if( !gfRenderHilights )
01439             return;
01440 
01441       iCurrentClock = GetClock();
01442       iTimeDifferential = iCurrentClock - iLastClock;
01443       if (iTimeDifferential < 0)
01444             iTimeDifferential += 0x7fffffff;
01445       iLastClock = iCurrentClock;
01446 
01447       if( MSYS_CurrRegion && MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpText )
01448       {
01449             if( !MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer )
01450             {
01451                   if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & ( MSYS_ALLOW_DISABLED_FASTHELP | MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
01452                   {
01453                         if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
01454                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags |= MSYS_FASTHELP;
01455                         else
01456                         {
01457                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags &= ( ~( MSYS_FASTHELP | MSYS_FASTHELP_RESET ) );
01458                         }
01459                         //Do I really need this?
01460                         //MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags |= REGION_DIRTY;
01461                         DisplayFastHelp( MSYS_CurrRegion );
01462                   }
01463             }
01464             else
01465             {
01466                   if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & ( MSYS_ALLOW_DISABLED_FASTHELP | MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
01467                   {
01468                         if ( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA &&
01469                                     !MSYS_CurrRegion->ButtonState)// & (MSYS_LEFT_BUTTON|MSYS_RIGHT_BUTTON)) )
01470                         {
01471                               MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer -= (INT16)max( iTimeDifferential, 0 );
01472 
01473                               if( MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer < 0 )
01474                               {
01475                                     MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer = 0;
01476                               }
01477                         }
01478                   }
01479             }
01480       }
01481 }
01482 #else

01499             {

01510 void DisplayFastHelp( MOUSE_REGION *region )
01511 {
01512       INT32 iX,iY,iW,iH;
01513 
01514       if ( region->uiFlags & MSYS_FASTHELP )
01515       {
01516             VideoToolTip(region->FastHelpText);
01517 
01518             iW = VideoGetToolTipWidth();
01519             iH = VideoGetToolTipHeight();
01520 
01521             iX = (INT32)region->RegionTopLeftX + 10;
01522 
01523             if (iX < 0)
01524                   iX = 0;
01525 
01526             if ( (iX + iW) >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
01527                   iX = (SCREEN_WIDTH - iW - 4);
01528 
01529             iY = (INT32)region->RegionTopLeftY - (iH * 3 / 4);
01530             if (iY < 0)
01531                   iY = 0;
01532 
01533             if ( (iY + iH) >= SCREEN_HEIGHT )
01534                   iY = (SCREEN_HEIGHT - iH - 15);
01535 
01536             VideoPositionToolTip(iX, iY);
01537       }
01538 }

01540 void DisplayHelpTokenizedString( STR16 pStringA, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
01541 {
01542       STR16 pToken;
01543       INT32 iCounter = 0, i;
01544       UINT32 uiCursorXPos;
01545       CHAR16 pString[ 512 ];
01546       INT32 iLength;
01547 
01548       wcscpy( pString, pStringA );
01549 
01550       // tokenize
01551       pToken = wcstok( pString, L"\n" );
01552 
01553       while( pToken != NULL )
01554   {
01555             iLength = (INT32)wcslen( pToken );
01556             for( i = 0; i < iLength; i++ )
01557             {
01558                   uiCursorXPos = StringPixLengthArgFastHelp( ghTinyMonoFont, ghTinyMonoFont, i, pToken );
01559                   if( pToken[ i ] == '|' )
01560                   {
01561                         i++;
01562                         SetFont(ghTinyMonoFont);
01563                         SetFontForeground( 2 );
01564                   }
01565                   else
01566                   {
01567                         SetFont( ghTinyMonoFont );
01568                         SetFontForeground( 2 );
01569                   }
01570                   mprintf( sX + uiCursorXPos, sY + iCounter * (GetFontHeight(ghTinyMonoFont)+1), L"%c", pToken[ i ] );
01571             }
01572             pToken = wcstok( NULL, L"\n" );
01573             iCounter++;
01574       }
01575 }
01576 
01577 void RenderFastHelp()
01578 {
01579       static INT32 iLastClock;
01580       INT32 iTimeDifferential, iCurrentClock;
01581 
01582       if( !gfRenderHilights )
01583             return;
01584 
01585       iCurrentClock = GetClock();
01586       iTimeDifferential = iCurrentClock - iLastClock;
01587       if (iTimeDifferential < 0)
01588             iTimeDifferential += 0x7fffffff;
01589       iLastClock = iCurrentClock;
01590 
01591       if( MSYS_CurrRegion && MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpText && gfShowFastHelp )
01592       {
01593             if( !MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer )
01594             {
01595                   if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & ( MSYS_ALLOW_DISABLED_FASTHELP | MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
01596                   {
01597                         if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
01598                         {
01599                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags |= MSYS_FASTHELP;
01600                               DisplayFastHelp( MSYS_CurrRegion );
01601                         }
01602                         else
01603                         {
01604                               MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags &= ( ~( MSYS_FASTHELP | MSYS_FASTHELP_RESET ) );
01605                               VideoRemoveToolTip();
01606                         }
01607                   }
01608             }
01609             else
01610             {
01611                   if( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & ( MSYS_ALLOW_DISABLED_FASTHELP | MSYS_REGION_ENABLED ) )
01612                   {
01613                         if ( MSYS_CurrRegion->uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA &&
01614                                     !MSYS_CurrRegion->ButtonState)// & (MSYS_LEFT_BUTTON|MSYS_RIGHT_BUTTON)) )
01615                         {
01616                               MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer -= (INT16)max( iTimeDifferential, 0 );
01617 
01618                               if( MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer < 0 )
01619                               {
01620                                     MSYS_CurrRegion->FastHelpTimer = 0;
01621                               }
01622                         }
01623                   }
01624             }
01625       }
01626 }

01639 void MSYS_AllowDisabledRegionFastHelp( MOUSE_REGION *region, BOOLEAN fAllow )
01640 {
01641       if( fAllow )
01642       {
01643             region->uiFlags |= MSYS_ALLOW_DISABLED_FASTHELP;
01644       }
01645       else
01646       {
01647             region->uiFlags &= ~MSYS_ALLOW_DISABLED_FASTHELP;
01648       }
01649 }

01653 void SetRegionHelpEndCallback( MOUSE_REGION *region, MOUSE_HELPTEXT_DONE_CALLBACK CallbackFxn )
01654 {
01655       // make sure region is non null
01656       if( region == NULL )
01657       {
01658             return;
01659       }
01660 
01661       // now set the region help text
01662       region-> HelpDoneCallback = CallbackFxn;
01663 
01664       return;
01665 }

01672             return;

01674 
01675       if( region->FastHelpTimer )
01676       {
01677             return;
01678       }
01679       // check if callback is non null
01680       if( region->HelpDoneCallback == NULL )
01681       {
01682             return;
01683       }
01684 
01685       // we have a callback, excecute
01686       // ATE: Disable these!
01687       //( *( region->HelpDoneCallback ) )( );
01688 
01689       return;
01690 }
